text: @JoeBiden In late February, weeks after Trump's China travel ban, House Speaker Nancy Pelosi was out in San Francisco's Chinatown encouraging people to go out in public and spend money at local businesses - despite concerns regarding the spread of the coronavirus. https://t.co/CSImERspiR
